moving

Class Ability

  • java.lang.Object
    • moving.Item
      • moving.Ability

  • public class Ability
extends Item
    A default ability. We were planning to make more abilities by extending this class, but we did not have time. So this is the only type of ability we have for now.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Ability

        public Ability(java.lang.String name,
       java.lang.String description,
       int xOnMap,
       int yOnMap,
       boolean isOnMap,
       int[] dmgRange,
       java.awt.Image img,
       java.awt.Image shotImage,
       int energyUse,
       double cooldown)
        Default constructor.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the ability.
        description - The description of the ability.
        xOnMap - The x position on the map, if it is on the map.
        yOnMap - The y position on the map, if it is on the map.
        isOnMap - Whether the item is on the map or not.
        dmgRange - The damage range of the ability, represented as an int array of length 2 [lower bound,upper bound]
        img - The icon for the ability.
        shotImage - The image of the shot(s) that the ability will shoot.
        energyUse - How much energy the ability uses on use.
        cooldown - The cooldown time for the ability (i.e. How long you must wait before using it again).

    • Method Detail

      • activate

        public void activate(Game myGame)
        Activates the ability. In other words, does what the ability is supposed to do.
        Parameters:
        myGame - A copy of the game to write info to.

      • update

        public void update()
        Updates the cooldown of the ability.
